en_text: 3.5x ATK for matched Att. when matching 5 Orbs with 1+ enhanced

jp_skill.name: アモンの宝剣
jp_skill.raw_description: 強化ドロップを含めて5個消した属性の攻撃力が3.5倍。

kr_skill.name: 아몬의 보검
kr_skill.raw_description: 강화드롭을 포함 5개 지운 속성의 공격력이 3.5배가 됨

na_skill.name: Amon's Royal Sword
na_skill.raw_description: 3.5x ATK for Att. erasing 5 Orbs with 1+ enhanced
